title: The Animals of Farthing Wood
creator_credit: Philippe LeClerc, Elphin Lloyd-Jones, John Mills, BBC and EBU
brief_description: This is a series of animated films about the animals of Farthing Wood and their journey. They set off on a very long journey, full of adventure and excitement. Based on the bestselling books of Colin Dann.

constellations_other.name: Make it cute, make them think
constellations_other.description: Cartoons and anime are known for their dynamic and vibrant visuals, but beneath the cuteness they can also deliver powerful environmental messages and address the climate crisis.

creator_credit_for_label: Philippe LeClerc, Elphin Lloyd-Jones, John Mills, BBC and EBU
description: This is a series of animated films about the animals of Farthing Wood and their journey. Kestrel brings news that the humans are filling in the pond, and with no source of water, they would surely die. Toad advises that they should head for the nature reserve at White Deer Park. They set off on a very long journey, full of adventure and excitement. Based on the bestselling books of Colin Dann.
description_for_label: This is a series of animated films about the animals of Farthing Wood and their journey. They set off on a very long journey, full of adventure and excitement. Based on the bestselling books of Colin Dann.
